mapper.select: select * from tbl_program order by order_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_program_storage (title, language, skill, start_date, end_date, sw) values (#{ title }, #{ language }, #{ skill }, #{ start_date }, #{ end_date }, 'n')
mapper.select: select uid , title , language , skill , date_format(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as start_date , date_format(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as end_date from tbl_program_storage
